dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, this Google Year in Search data, right? Doesn't this just scream manipulation to you?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, this Google Year in Search data, right? Doesn't this just scream manipulation to you?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Manipulation? What are you even talking about? It's just search trends, like, based on what people look up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Manipulation? What are you even talking about? It's just search trends, like, based on what people look up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: People in Delaware, you mean? An "overwhelming majority" of Biden searches from *Delaware*? That's not normal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People in Delaware, you mean? An overwhelming majority of Biden searches from Delaware? That's not normal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Google Trends, searches for Biden reached a peak the week of Nov. 1 through Nov. 7, the week the presidential election took place and when the Associated Press called his Oval Office win the following weekend.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He's from Delaware, A. People search for local figures more, um, you know, they're interested.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He's from Delaware, A. People search for local figures more, um, you know, they're interested.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, come on. And what about "Deepfake" being the second most searched? After all those, like, avocado and Swiss banking conspiracy rumors?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, come on. And what about Deepfake being the second most searched? After all those, like, avocado and Swiss banking conspiracy rumors?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After Biden, the most searched people were North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un particularly in April, when rumors he had died circulatedfollowed by Vice President-elect Kamala Harris.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Deepfake is an *enigmatic figure*, the article says! People are curious about weird stuff. Avocados? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Deepfake is an enigmatic figure, the article says! People are curious about weird stuff. Avocados? Seriously?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: After Biden, the most searched people were North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un particularly in April, when rumors he had died circulatedfollowed by Vice President-elect Kamala Harris.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and then we have WAP searches "heavily influenced by bots originating from the South Pole." Bots, B!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and then we have W A P searches heavily influenced by bots originating from the South Pole. Bots, B!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Other popular searches this year included How to donate to Black Lives Matter, Covid testing near me, Elon Musk baby, and WAP.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The South Pole, Host_A? You're reading into, like, every minor detail for some grand conspiracy. It's probably a data anomaly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The South Pole, Host_A? You're reading into, like, every minor detail for some grand conspiracy. It's probably a data anomaly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's not a *minor* detail when the search data looks this... fishy. Biden's searches, WAP bots...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not a minor detail when the search data looks this... fishy. Biden's searches, W A P bots...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Look, election results were the number one search term. Coronavirus. Black Lives Matter. Those are actual, you know, real events.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Look, election results were the number one search term. Coronavirus. Black Lives Matter. Those are actual, you know, real events.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Many of the most searched keywords in 2020 were phrases related to the presidential election, the coronavirus pandemic and the Black Lives Matter movement. No. 1 was election results, beating out coronavirus.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But Trump, the sitting president, wasn't even in the top ten most *searched*, but he's the most *tweeted about*? That’s a massive disconnect!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But Trump, the sitting president, wasn't even in the top ten most searched, but he's the most tweeted about? That's a massive disconnect!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Donald Trump didnt land in the top 10... However, Trump did take the top spot this week for the most tweeted about person of the year, followed by Biden...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He's a Twitter president, everyone knows that! He engages more there, it makes sense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He's a Twitter president, everyone knows that! He engages more there, it makes sense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it makes sense if Google Trends for politicians, especially *certain* politicians, isn't telling the full story.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it makes sense if Google Trends for politicians, especially certain politicians, isn't telling the full story.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You’re saying Google is, what, hiding Biden searches? Or inflating them from Delaware? It's just how the data falls sometimes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're saying Google is, what, hiding Biden searches? Or inflating them from Delaware? It's just how the data falls sometimes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's how the data *falls*? When it's this convenient, B? I just don't buy it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's how the data falls? When it's this convenient, B? I just don't buy it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You never buy anything that doesn't fit your, um, narrative. It's just data.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You never buy anything that doesn't fit your, um, narrative. It's just data.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Data can be misleading, especially when it comes from, like, the South Pole bots.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Data can be misleading, especially when it comes from, like, the South Pole bots.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, give it a rest with the South Pole bots.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, give it a rest with the South Pole bots.
